title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 81.7 - Department's failure to respond
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 81.7 - Department's failure to respond

State Regulations
A failure to grant or deny access to records within five
business days of the receipt of a request, or within 30 days of an
acknowledgment of the receipt, or failure to respond to a request for amendment
or correction of a record within 30 business days of receipt of such a request, shall be construed as a denial that may be appealed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
81.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
